website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one kit that includes a ceramic pot, salt, and herbal drops.
pros: The reusable ceramic is more sterile than plastic options
Large salt container is more economical than pre-measured packets
Sinus sufferers appreciate the included essential oils
cons: A few owners reported the fragile ceramic cracked after only a few uses
Some found the smaller capacity meant there was not enough water to achieve the necessary flow for effective treatment

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: This neti pot has changed my life, literally. I've heard people talk about it but was skeptical. I am a long time allergy sufferer. I even had surgery to fix a deviated septum in hopes that I could breath better. The surgery was successful for a short time due to my extreme allergies. After one use of this neti pot, salt and serum I could actually breath. The sinus pain and pressure was gone. I am a true believer! I have posted on Facebook and voiced to family and friends how much I love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Roderick

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: the neti pot does work well i highly recommend purchasing it but not from here. I received mine with no safety seal on the oil or the salt. This is extremely sketchy considering the label on the oil bottle states "do not use if safety seal is broken" I would love for the company that this is sold through to explain why the safety seals are conveniently missing. Considering this is going up your nose and down your throat don't buy something that has obviously been tapered with.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome neti pot for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Reading the instructions was a bit tedious but otherwise I believe that this is an awesome deal for a good quality neti pot. Caution for those used who are new to this. Use distilled water unless you boil water in an extremely sanitary pot or kettle. I got a sinus infection a week after using this likely from my kettle but haven't had one since switching to distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan L

customer_reviews.title: Neti pot nozzle blocked.
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle is blocked with the same material the neti pot is made of. Plus there is no return policy. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAY too small
customer_reviews.text: The size of this neti pot is so small as to render it unusable. I like to run 16 ounces of water when I do a neti, and this holds only 6 ounces maximum (and that's filling it so much it almost spills), which means I have to refill 3 times. Just a huge inconvenience. The small size also means you get less pressure, so it takes longer for the water to go through, and if you are really congested it sometimes doesn't run at all. It's nice looking, but just not functional.
customer_reviews.author: Afam

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived and had obviously been opened previously. The bottom had been poorly taped shut. The salt canister had no safety seal and was actually open in the box. Salt was everywhere. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: glen

customer_reviews.title: Best Neti Pot I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: I've suffered from allergies my entire life. I've owned neti pots in the past and I was a bit skeptical about spending this much on a neti pot, but trust me. This is a good buy. The salt is easy on your system compared to salts I've purchased in the normal grocery store. The essential oil is nice too. Can't tell if that's doing much for me, but one major difference I've noticed is that in the past, when I'm done using my neti pot, I usually experience a period where inflammation in my nasal passage makes it so I can't breathe through my nose for a while.... not with this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Talk America

customer_reviews.title: Not the Original and not returnable FYI
customer_reviews.text: I broke my Original Himalayan Neti that I owned for 15 years. It was purchased at The Himalayan Institute in Honesdale PA It was a light porcelain like material This one is NOT that pot It's a thick earthenware type of material and poor quality The glazed was defective on the one I received However, Amazon did issue me a refund because it was damaged I would pay 3 times the amount to be able to replace my broken pot with one of the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: hteb18

customer_reviews.title: Not well designed... salt water spills everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies and have been using Neti pots for nasal cleansing for over 15 years now and have gone thru several ceramic pots. I love how soothing it is when I get flare ups. The design of this ceramic pot is not ergonomic at all. The handle loop is too small. I can only fit one finger thru, making it unsteady to hold. The container as a whole is shallow and long; when I tilt my head and the pot to irrigate, salt water spills out from the top. It’s odd shape is almost unusable for the purpose that it is suppose to serve.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. Quality is excellent. I like the size of the salts container and they were very gentle and appreciate the extra bottle of nose solvent. The pot is very nice and Im very appreciate of the very good instructions. I had no issues at all. The instructions give lots of suggestions and are detailed. Thank you. I would recommend this to anyone interested in purchasing a neti pot, especially if you are a first time user. It is well worth the cost for the quality is good. I doubt I will ever have to purchase another neti pot now, just refill on salts.
customer_reviews.author: Vickies Place

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a ceramic neti pot anywhere near me and then finally found this on Amazon. I used it for the first time today and loved it right away. I live in Michigan, so this will be great for the winter months. It gets super dry here and everyone has sinus issues in this cold weather. I'm hoping it will help keep the winter sinus infections away from my family and me... plus the flu, which is running rampant right now. This pot worked just a described and my sinuses felt nearly 100% better right away. I love that this kit comes with the EO boost.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Received cracked Neti Pot
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product. I received this neti pot on, May 9, 2020. I spent over $20.00 (this includes tax) for the neti pot and when I opened it there was a crack in it. I tried to return the neti pot and the company will not accept the return. I tried to submit a review and the company rejected the initial review. I am extremely disappointed with the company and the product
customer_reviews.author: Tomiko Meeks

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: A Neti Pot was recommended to me after having a conversation about allergies. It was always in the back of my mind, but I didn't purchase it until I started having congestion when the weather started getting cold. I decided on this particular one b/c it came with everything I needed (except for the water). Remember to hold your head forward while tilting it to the side so it won't go down your throat. It fully clears my nasal passages, and I'm very pleased with it. I would definitely recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: JustMy2Cents

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pressure, didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been suffering with allergy this season and thought after looking at videos this would help. The bottom line is that it does not have enough pressure to work through severe congestion. The very next day I went out and bought the plastic squeeze bottle version. This develops enough pressure to irrigate your sinuses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cools

customer_reviews.title: It Helped
customer_reviews.text: The solution does help a lot. It help thinner your mucus. I would recommend to use it twice a day: before going to bed and after waking up. The first week will be a little different since it will try to clean out your mucus. After two weeks, you feel so much cleaner and almost no postnasal drip. I would recommend trying if you have chronic sinusitis like me.
customer_reviews.author: NGAN98

customer_reviews.title: Great Neti Pot
customer_reviews.text: I started using a Neti with the plastic kind you can buy at the grocery store and realized since the plastic is molded it cuts the inside of my nose. This ceramic pot is wonderful! It is completely smooth around the edges and looks good sitting on the counter. I'd highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality salt in an easy to use container.
customer_reviews.text: The neti pot was smaller than expected but you can still use it, if you fill it up twice. So while it's usable, it's not convenient for someone who uses it daily like me. I prefer to use a neti pot in the shower, instead of leaning over the sink, which can make my neck sore. So basically, I like the neti-salt and it's container which can be refilled, but not as happy with the neti pot. No quality issues with this purchase, just a size preference difference.
customer_reviews.author: Island April

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for allergies!
customer_reviews.text: Using the pot takes a bit of skill but it’s so worth it to help clean your sinuses. I suffer from allergies that trigger asthma attacks and this can all spiral down to pneumonia. My doctor recommended I try using a Neti pot everyday and it has made a crazy difference. I would not recommend the oil solution. My sister tried it (I wouldn’t) and said everything smelled burned for a week after she used it.
customer_reviews.author: Marichelle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible water boarding experience
customer_reviews.text: My nasal passages were so raw after using this and my clothes were soaked. Unreturnale item so that’s for taking my money!!! Used once never again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job of cleaning out your sinuses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because my grandmother has always had sinus problems. Stuffy nose, phlegm etc. It was my first time using it, I set it up for her and did it for her. Her sinuses were much clearer and she didn't feel as much pressure as she's used to feeling. The little pot is very nice and sturdy and overall it was an easy product to use.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit! I've never done neti, and this has everything you need. Make sure to either use distilled water, or boil it for a few minutes, because there are a few organisms that can live in city water supplies that will cause tremendous health problems if absorbed through the mucous membranes in your nose. I boil for 5 minutes, because I'm at a mile elevation, and that's two minutes longer than the 3 minutes recommended by health organizations at that elevation.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Loblaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been battelling sinus problems for years. We were talking about the problem at a store when a customer recommended she try a neti pot. I ordered one for her and it worked so well I ordered one for myself. I can attest that the pot works, and it works quickly. If you are thinking about a Neti pot, stop. Just order one. You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: A whole lot of NOPE
customer_reviews.text: I have used neti pots for years and this thing is absolutely ridiculous. It's way too small to hold enough water to get a good flow and the spout is way too big (I know, how is that possible, but it is!) It's pretty, but the cheap plastic ones are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use and makes a mess
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value and I appreciate the historic science behind it. Reality is the water leaks out of the top of the pot and creates a mess while you’re trying to use it. There are much better and easier options that flush your nose and sinuses rather than this pot.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It took me a minute to get used to the process but once I got it down it was easy. It's kind of addictive because of how you feel afterwards. My nose will drip for about 15-30 minutes after the rinse but after that I'm fine. I bought this because I don't want to be on any allergy medication and seems to help. I can rinse on small flair ups and I'm fine after. I still have to test it on bad flair up days. I haven't had one yet but I know it's coming.
customer_reviews.author: STAY LOW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean=happy nose
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, it takes longer than the squeeze bottle ones but my nose likes it better. With a deviated septum and severe allergies the original neti pot is the best for me. I also like that it is easier to clean and dry. The squeeze bottles start to smell funky after a few months no matter how much you clean them and sanitize them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first pot
customer_reviews.text: This was my first netty pot I used it as soon as I got it (cause I want to itch my nose off my face) and I felt relief right after. Wasn’t sure how much water to use cause it doesn’t say so I used 1 cup & it says to use warm so I heated it up in the mircowave.
customer_reviews.author: It’s Whitney B##ch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This netti pot, along with the salt and drops, helped to heal my nose after I had been blowing blood out of it day in and out for over two weeks. Within three uses of this product, my nose was no longer bloody and remains clear weeks later. Saved me a trip to the doctor. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Hayfever/cold :(
customer_reviews.text: Since moving to the mojave desert from the California coast my sinus' have been messed up, then I caught a head cold. Decided to try this neti pot over others due to it including the saline and a moisturizing tincture. I've used it 3 morning and what an improvement. Once I got the hang of it...then blowing my nose after...yuk the stuff that came out. I'll spare you. I'll just say, it felt good to breath.
customer_reviews.author: D.Mae

customer_reviews.title: Less gross.
customer_reviews.text: Let’s be honest these things are gross. Buuuuut, at least you can throw a ceramic one in the dishwasher! If you use netti pots gets the ceramic it’s just less gross.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a solution for my allergies
customer_reviews.text: I've always suffered from bad allergies but this season has been the worst of them all. I haven't been able to breathe for months. And it doesn't help that I'm allergic to everything. After trying everything I decided to give this a shot. Im so glad I did! And I'm glad I purchased this one, the oil is awesome and it comes with so much salt. Anyone who gets used to not being able to breathe through their nose knows that is no way to live.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby M.

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh I can breathe again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I had a bad cold last month and I have seen my brother use one that he had for a while. He unfortunately didn't buy a complete kit with the salt and booster drops. This helped me get over my cold but as a result of using it since then it has rinsed my nasal passage so well that I have been able to taste food better and breathe better. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Is this how normal peoplw usually breathe!?!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the 1st time tonight! I'm not going to lie at all, it wasn't a great feeling to have water running through my sinuses. BUT it feels so great after! I have lung and allergy issues and my specialist said this would be a great preventative for me. I hope it helps with preventing problems like it did to make it easier to breathe through my nose! I will continue to use this even with the odd feeling of using it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I truly like this set. I have very bad allergies and Neti pots have always been my best remedy. I also find this process very ritualistic as part of purifying in the yoga principles. The ceramic pot enriches the experience and the moisturizing essential oils feel very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Held

customer_reviews.title: Sinus Infection Suffers Need This
customer_reviews.text: If you get colds, sinus infections, allergies, then you need this neti-pot. It has helped me so much in my sinus battles and I have all but one infection a year (down from 3-4 a year). I would speak to your doctor before adding it to your regiment but mine recommended it. Make sure you are using filtered water and follow the directions. I would strongly suggest against googling "neti-pot" videos because they tend to showcase folks using them incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Broken ineligible for return
customer_reviews.text: The item was chipped on the top/inside and I was told I could not return it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gromley

customer_reviews.title: I like it, Would recommend to others interested in trying out neti pots
customer_reviews.text: For the money a great neti pot. I have dropped one too many ceramic pots but still prefer them greatly over the plastic pots. I have had other ceramic pots that were much nicer but they were a lot more expensive. My one gripe about this neti pot is that the spout is rather large. Makes it a bit difficult to get a seal with your nose. Overall gets the job done. Prefer it much over the plastic pots. Anyone trying out neti pots for the first time I would recommend this one for the money / experience that you get using it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E Salcedo III

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year and a half ago because I had a constantly blocked nose. I used it sporadically and it would clear my sinus but the blockage would always return. However, I recently committed to consistently using it, which I have been doing for about a month now. One day after about 3 weeks I realized I could breathe normally without any blockage. My nose is clear and the difference is awesome. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Nazer

customer_reviews.title: I like the look
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, classic design, however I can't really do a steep angle pour or it spills out the top. Maybe I'm being too aggressive on the pour.
customer_reviews.author: SaDo

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think I’d be a fan of this as it’s just weird pouring something into your nose yet I’ve gotten used to the ease of pouring to help clear sinuses. Instructions are easy to read and set up.
customer_reviews.author: L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: BEST!!!! Don't make yourself suffer!!
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say I suffered post nasal drip for 7 weeks. Went to the doctor's twice and they gave me meds that they was forsure would clear it up. Nothing worked until I got this Neti pot. I LOVED it so much i will be buying this for gifts. NO MORE SUFFERING!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Himalayan Chandra Neti Pot
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend for allergies, the Himalayan Chandra Neti Pot works wonders. With the Neti Wash PLUS and the Neti Salt, I have no issues with allergies any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: l got it today and used it. It definitely helps. I have sinus and had a slight headache. It opened the blocking and headache has gone. Miracle in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Meenakshi Sharma

customer_reviews.title: It m
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I had never used a Neti pot before. But it was recommended that I give a try. It has lessen my allergies, gotten rid of the cold faster than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jinny12

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: No question about it -- Neti pots work. I like this ceramic version. Maybe it's psychological, but I feel that the ceramic vessel is easier to keep clean. The sinus cleaning system works. Don't give up if you don't get the "technique" down right away. It took me a few tries to get the right pouring angle. And, expect to have a gag reaction. You WILL get over this. Just enjoy the comforting feeling that flushing your nasal sinuses creates. Also helps reduces bad breath that results from bacteria-filled mucus in your nasal cavaties.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Himalayan Chandra Netti-pot
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product and the Oil that you add to the Salt mix. The only issue was they forgot to put the scoop in for the salt. Other then that the quality of the netting pot is ceramic and I got the salt mix and oil as a package. It comes Nicely packed. I Recommend this product!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: DLandizzle

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from nasal pressure and drainage for a few months now. I have tried everything to relieve the pressure. I purchased this netipot as a last ditch effort to get my quality of life back. I can not tell you how impressed I am with how well the netipot starter kit worked. I was shocked with how much nasal drainage came out. After one treatment I was able to finally breathe! I have not been able to take a deep breath in months! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Dearest

customer_reviews.title: Not good for small nasal passages
customer_reviews.text: Cute little pot but I have small nasal passages and it just was not comfortable for me. I ended up reordering from a different company one made especially for narrow noses.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Nice little pot for what its intended for.
customer_reviews.text: This item works ok. Suction? No, but runs thru in a good stream. Looks good, the pot us pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Laverne S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product was packaged very well. Love the quality and design. It has very thorough instructions and simple to use. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Acetherascal

customer_reviews.title: THEE best lifesaver. I have asthma
customer_reviews.text: THEE best lifesaver. I have asthma, bad allergies and sinus congestion. I was looking for a more natural way to get relief and this is definitely the answer I needed. I watched some videos on Youtube to help with learning the proper way to use this product but with a little practice, I'm an expert now.
customer_reviews.author: LisaNicole

customer_reviews.title: Helped Clear Out My Sinuses
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible year-round sinus and allergy issues and am on a couple of daily prescriptions but still have times when I need that something extra so I can breathe! A co-worker swears by this product, so I ordered it. I followed the instructions and did feel a lot of relief after using it and slept better that night. However, I must have somehow gotten water lodged into my ear canal from using this because I was in pain for several days after. I did the moves after using it and don't know what happened, but it wasn't fun. I will give it another try next time I'm super stopped up though.
customer_reviews.author: ChristieL.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a gravy boat
customer_reviews.text: This is the great product. I’m clumsy and have dropped it a few time and it’s still going strong. This is also great to use as a gravy boat on thanksgiving. Be sure to wash before.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: The person who recommended it to me was over the moon about it ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't as impressed with the neti pot as I had hoped to be. The person who recommended it to me was over the moon about it but it ended up not helping me very much. I hadn't experienced any allergies until the past winter when it hit really hard for me. Overall, the neti pot didn't really help past the first five minutes after each use. I was certain follow the directions to the letter but it didn't really have the effect I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kitch

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the Sinusis and clears up anything in the way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much work But worth it
customer_reviews.text: Boil water for 5min. Let water cool. Add salt. Use the dropper of the solution they give you. Try not to drOwn. Finally YouTubed it and success!
customer_reviews.author: Tania M.

customer_reviews.title: reformed skeptic
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the idea of pouring salt water in my nose to make me feel better. I don't like taking antibiotics so, I decided to give it a try. Guess what? it worked great! It took a few times to get the hang of it. I'm so happy I tried this neti pot. The other goog=d thing about this is it is a complete kit which included the pot, salt and boost drops (these burned my nose). I recommend buying this kit if you are thinking about trying this method because it is a good price to try all three.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nose clearing.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I have asthma and allergies. My doctor had recommended me to use this a year back but I never got around to getting it. Now I'm starting a new job and I didn't want to be congested during this season, my new boss is very healthy and holistic, so she recommended this to me too and showed me how to use it. Got one and it's helped a ton. Good quality, comes with a tub of fine grain salt (200+ scoops & a scooper, you gotta dig a little if you don't see it) and the dropper of essential oils. Very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I bought this kits.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Read the directions and don't forget to use distilled water. After you do this...do not stand up. Stay bent over for a bit to let things drain out then you won't become nauseous.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Duran

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The pot itself is beautiful and well-made. I also love the oil that comes with it. It makes the process much more relaxing and enjoyable, which says a lot since you're rinsing out your sinuses, not necessarily an enjoyable process in itself.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand having water in my nose, but after several years of constant sinus congestion and pain I was ready to try anything. It took several tries to get the angle right, but after I did, all I can say is wow. It was an odd sensation, but not painful, and I adjusted quickly. Two days later, I was able to breathe through my nose without the aid of medication and the constant sinus headache was gone. I'm never going back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: All of my problems went away - never feel like they existed
customer_reviews.text: This is such a revelation. I had sinus, clogged nose and could never breathe well. Have been using it for the past two weeks, not sure why I did not buy it earlier. All of my problems went away - never feel like they existed. I only use the pot twice / thrice a week and that in itself has made such a huge difference. My wife says I have not been snoring a lot since the past week - not sure if this is the reason. But I will monitor and update after a month.
customer_reviews.author: chanrish

customer_reviews.title: I can breathe
customer_reviews.text: Second one I've bought (first was lost in a move). I love it makes a huge difference for me. My sinus cavity is tilted so I get very stuffed up this fixes that problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Buyer
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Perfectly packaged. Easy instructions, and as always, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Partners

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's suppose to, but mine came with weird black marks embedded on the Neti pot. Not sure if that affects the integrity of the Neti pot. I'm not a fan of imperfections if that's all it is but considering the cost and how it would have inconvenienced me to return/exchange, I just dealt with it. Decent product, though.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: A really good Neti Pot Kit
customer_reviews.text: I needed to upgrade my neti Pot from plastic to glass and picked out this kit. Easy to use no problem cleaning I clean with organic liquid soap rinse with warm water and air dry. Comes with everything needed to clean your nasal passages. Packed really well overall a nice kit at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: MCK

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the little bottle of oil that comes with the whole thing smells great. The only bad thing about this item is the actual pot, the little hole is not centered. I mean it’s fine it still works. And the measuring spoon is literally inside the salt, like I had to shake it so that it comes up to the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy and cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: I find myself using my lightweight plastic neti pot over this one given its porcelain and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good for Rhinitis/ Sinus issue sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product twice! ( I dropped my first one on a tile floor!!!) As someone with severe allergies, chronic sinusitis and post nasal drip, I use this a few times a week. It’s really helped me breathe better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Serena Adams

customer_reviews.title: I am now a true believer in the benefits of neti.
customer_reviews.text: I am now a true believer in the benefits of neti. I was skeptical at first and even concerned about all the people saying they couldn't do it, felt like you are drowning. Not true. It's easy and since I started not one more sinus infection which early this year kept reoccurring. This is an excellent neti pot and the salt product that comes with it is very high quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Hutt

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend you get this to help reduce the time and ...
customer_reviews.text: The neti pot saves me every time I get a cold. I don't know what I'd do without it. If you have nasal irritation or get a cold a couple times a year, I definitely recommend you get this to help reduce the time and irritation of cold symptoms!
customer_reviews.author: major_critic.deal_lover

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive complete kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the neti pot itself. Amazing upgrade from the plastic drugstore one I've had for a while. The jar of salts is a big plus over the individual packets. I can't wait to try them out. I was very disappointed that I was sent a box that had been opened from the bottom and the neti wash removed. It would have been better if I purchased the pot and salts separately.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Q

customer_reviews.title: WOW- very surprised
customer_reviews.text: I used this last night for the first time. It was easier than I thought. I was worried about the water entering my throat and chocking. This was not an issue. The first attempt seemed to burn a bit so I reduced the amount of salt--even though I was sure I did not use more than recommended. I remember commenting about 25 times that evening how clear my sinuses and had felt. I slept like two rocks! I you constantly sniffle or have any sinus blockage you should give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great for when you feel sick
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I get sick relatively often with a toddler in day care. This has been used a whole heck of a lot in the last few months. It helps with clearing out the junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely helped me and my his when we felt like we were dying from our colds. I’ll definitely use it come allergy season.
customer_reviews.author: The Aleet

customer_reviews.title: Make breathing easy EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Not as strange a feeling as I expected when I tried this product... it was really quite easy and not uncomfortable at all. I was definitely pleased with the results! You don't realize how much better you can smell things until you try it with clean sinuses. The kit has everything you need to get going for a reasonable price. Would definitely recommend this, especially for those with allergy or sinus problems. I suffer from neither, however, and have also benefitted from using the Neti pot.
customer_reviews.author: IntheGroove

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Simple instructions and really helps so much. Great during my cold.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first, but it works like a dream! My husband and I were both sick with a sinus cold at the same time. He took night/day quill and I used only the neti pot. I was feeling better 3 days earlier than he was and use it periodically when my sinuses feel stuffy. I don't do it every day as the directions describe, but it is very nice to clear your sinuses before yoga and pilates. I would recommend this to anyone who is even a little curious about it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mrazovich

customer_reviews.title: Purpose/action of herbs contained in Daily Neto Pot Boost
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the fact there was no discription of each of the actions/benefits of the herbs contained in the “Daily Neti Pot Boost” drops supplied with the Neti Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Z.D. Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: You gotta try it!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is da bomb...had been sick for going on 3 weeks and decided to try the Neti-Pot...was so mad at myself for not trying it before...it cleaned out my nasal cavity so quick and easy...it is actually comfortable using it...will be using it regularly (1-2 times a week)in hopes of warding off some allergy issues!!
customer_reviews.author: JustBrenna

customer_reviews.title: sticking it up my nose.
customer_reviews.text: it's hard to talk without tearing up from joy. is that joy of sticking something in my nose every night and flushing my system out with salt water.. nah not really.. it's joy from sleeping better, from not coughing from the dry air at night, from the end of my post nasal drip.. oh and really that is a complete and utter joy. Ever since I started using this my winter cough (the one i get every.single.year.) is gone!! This is a well made system, i love the herbal flush addition!! I am a convert for life and i've begun to preach the light... thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Rovics

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I was getting too many colds. It definitely helps to get rid of the extra drainage I had. Unfortunately, the salt is really powerful and when you put too much it hurt. So I had to be careful. Also, I recommend boiling water and not using tap water as it's dangerous/deadly.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good and easy to use . Make sure to get some distilled water or you can always boil water for it . Instructions were clear although the drops didn’t come with instruction .
customer_reviews.author: Chad Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product while in the midst of a terrible cold that was hanging on and driving me nuts. The first day I used it I was able to get a lot of mess out of my sinuses right away and I could tell an enormous difference. I feel that it helped me avoid sinusitis from that virus and helped me feel better right away. I now use it about every other day; the winter dryness bothers me and using this product really helps. Buy one, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: I like the porcelain as it's easy to clean and keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the porcelain as it's easy to clean and keep clean and lasts a long time! The amount of salt and drops that came with this has lasted me forever. Love my neti!
customer_reviews.author: EllieA

customer_reviews.title: Can't Live Without This!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a Neti Pot for years. It is the best thing I have found to keep allergies and typical sinus infections and stuffiness away. I use it a minimum of once a day, but sometimes in the summer or when the winds kick up, I use it up to three times a day. You can't go wrong with this product. I have save so many doctor visits, just by using this product along with the salt.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product! Bought it for my son and it worked wonderfully!!
customer_reviews.author: Harley Young

customer_reviews.title: Not COMPLETE
customer_reviews.text: Did not include Neti cleanser. Note: item is ineligible for return. Poor.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Yokota

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time and good shape. I used right away, the instructions are simple and clear. It help me to take out what my allergie cause in my mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Santacruz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used one of these before, but it included easy-to-understand instructions. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to adjust so it doesn’t come out of your throat. I def need practice :)
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: It is a good set, but there is no top to the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good set, but there is no top to the neti pot, so the solution will pour out if tipped slightly. The pot can't be filled more than half without water spilling out if tipped more than 30 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: ZOMG THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with nose issues any time I get sick. Nothing helped me more than this! amazing. Prior to deciding to get this neti pot I've been using the saline solution spray but it can't compare to the strength and effect of this neti pot's saline solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The salt jar has crack open when I receive it. So I’m not sure what inside ?
customer_reviews.text: The salt jar has crack open when I receive it. So I’m not sure what inside ?
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when buying this product so I read A LOT of reviews first. I am glad I bought it. It has helped me feel relief during the flu and when I had a sinus infection. I should really use it weekly or biweekly to help me from getting sick in the first place. Once thing I will say is use bottled water and not tap water.
customer_reviews.author: Angela A.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy, though it feels funny at first.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a believer but now I am. I use this when I have nasal congestion and it works great. Feels a little funny at first, but it's actually quite easy. Doesn't feel like your drowning or uncomfortable at all. Also much more effective at clearing out all the mucus than constant nose-blowing. Boil your water to sterilize before you use it, just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Buildable

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU HAVE SINUS AND RESPIRATORY ISSUES OR JUST A BAD COLD YOU NEED THIS
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU SO MUCH OH GOD I WAS SO SICK I WISH I’D ORDERED SOONER Side note- Happy I got the ceramic, I’ve cracked two of the plastic ones. This on appears to be pretty sturdy and also had a year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I had been taking Zyrtec every night and I felt a little better but definitely not 100%
customer_reviews.text: I have always been nervous to try these neti-pots but after suffering from a dry scratchy throat for 2 weeks, I decided to give it a try. It really did help a lot. I had been taking Zyrtec every night and I felt a little better but definitely not 100%. This neti-pot did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Serrato

customer_reviews.title: Something I needed right away and was just exactly the right thing.
customer_reviews.text: I had looked around for the item and did not find a proper one. Ordered it and received in three days, exactly what I had looked for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Schuenemann

customer_reviews.title: Sinuses? This is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I was able to clean my whole families stuffed noses. It worked amazingly! And I mean it, all the goo just came out of the noses and we all were able to breathe freely that night. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

product_meta.title: Himalayan Chandra Neti Pot Complete Sinus Cleansing System Starter Kit
product_meta.description: The Starter Kit contains everything needed for a daily nasal wash routine: Ceramic Neti Pot, Neti Pot Salt 10 ounce jar, and Neti Wash Plus 2 ounce bottle. The Himalayan Institute introduced the Neti Pot 35 years ago as the perfect tool to support sinus health. The Neti Pot naturally cleanses, refreshes, and protects the nasal passages. Starter kit includes: Ceramic Neti Pot- Our bestselling ceramic Neti Pot makes nasal irrigation easy and comfortable. The trademarked lotus design and distinctive shape dispenses the perfect rate of flow to optimally cleanse the sinus passages. Made with lead-free ceramic and glaze. Neti Pot Salt- Perfect for use with the nasal wash system, Neti Pot Salt is 99.99% USP grade salt, the highest purity salt commercially available. It is non-iodized and contains no additives or anti-caking agents. Use a heaping quarter teaspoon per Neti Pot use. 10 ounce refillable jar with measuring spoon. Neti Wash Plus Daily Neti Pot Boost- This formula contains soothing herbal extracts, essential oils, and Xylitol to cool, decongest, and invigorate. It helps to nourish and moisturize nasal passages and provides properties to support the health of your sinuses. Neti Wash Plus contains 5 herbal extracts, essential oils of Peppermint, Eucalyptus, and Menthol and other ingredients that mildly cleanse and soothe the sinuses.
feature_bullets: The Neti Pot Starter Kit contains everything needed for a daily nasal wash routine , Dishwasher Safe
Naturally removes excess mucus, pollen, dust, and other environmental irritants from the sinus passages
Enhances sinus and immune support with Neti Wah Plus
